department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Acquisition of various furniture items for the Canadian Space Agency (CSA) in Longueuil, required by February 26, 2024.
description: PWGSC, on behalf of CSA, is issuing this request for proposal for the acquisition, delivery and installation of various Interconnecting panels, Fixed height work surface, Privacy screens, Height adjustable work surfaces, and various tables for the Longueuil region. The procurement is part of a Supply Arrangement under the Goods and Services - Goods category. The estimated delivery date is February 26, 2024.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Reference Information
* **Title (English/French)**: Ef944-232251 - Ef944-240901 - Acquisition Furniture Under SA Cat 1, 2, and 6 for CSA / Acquisition de mobilier sous AMA Cat 1, 2 et 6 pour ASC
* **Contract Reference Number**: WS4153731980 - Doc4153732040
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Publication Date**: 2023-08-29
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-09-21T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-09-29

#### Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Canadian Space Agency (CSA) invites proposals for the acquisition, delivery, and installation of various furniture items, including interconnecting panels, fixed-height work surfaces, privacy screens, height-adjustable work surfaces, and tables for the Longueuil region.

#### Category Code 
The procurement is categorized under UNSPSC codes *56101519* (Tables), *56101706* (Conferencing tables), *56101712* (Pedestals), *56101719* (Side table), and *56111601* (Screens for panel systems).

#### Procurement Details
The procurement category is *Government and Defence*. The procurement method is competitive, and the selection criteria will be the **lowest price**. Trade agreements applicable to the procurement include the *Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)*, *Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)*, and others.

#### End User Entity 
The *Canadian Space Agency (CSA)* is the end user of the procurement.

#### Contact Information
Queries can be directed to Julie Carbonneau, PSPC, at: julie.carbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

#### Notice 
Refer to the official notice: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17295878?extsite=MTcyOTU4NzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

#### Items Description 
The procurement requires the delivery of furniture items, including:

* Interconnecting panels
* Fixed-height work surfaces
* Privacy screens
* Height-adjustable work surfaces
* Various tables

Note: The text was comressed to fit within
